Title: Requires corporations to provide written notice to the municipality in which the canal is located and properties adjacent to such canal prior to commencing work along such canal
Summary: Requires corporations to provide written notice to the municipality in which the canal is located and properties adjacent to such canal prior to commencing work along such canal; requires the corporation to hold a public hearing prior to commencing such work; allows for exceptions in certain situations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the canal law, in relation to requiring corporations to provide written notice to the municipality in which the canal is located and properties adjacent to such canal prior to commencing work along such canal
